build.buildCommand: python -m pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput

deploy.startCommand: python manage.py migrate && python manage.py createsuperuser --noinput --username=$DJANGO_SUPERUSER_USERNAME --email=$DJANGO_SUPERUSER_EMAIL 2>/dev/null || true && gunicorn excel_extractor.wsgi
